svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2024-02-21T06:13:10.860Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/121.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="3TSL3fbZwsv-uSKxF0n8" version="23.1.1" type="device"> <diagram name="第 1 页" id="W85dywiWVULoFKrGgWqL"> <mxGraphModel dx="762" dy="480" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" background="#E6E6E6" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="XE8YkClymrqiUMG65ZjQ-10" value="位运算" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="10" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XE8YkClymrqiUMG65ZjQ-11" value="位运算是二进制数值间各位进行的运算。" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="90" width="290" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7AKbJpd9o4BwKJ33l0iX-18" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;fontSize=12;startSize=8;endSize=8;curved=1;strokeColor=#CCCCCC;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="30" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7AKbJpd9o4BwKJ33l0iX-32" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;fontSize=12;startSize=8;endSize=8;curved=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="520" y="1120" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="520" y="40" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7AKbJpd9o4BwKJ33l0iX-57" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;fontSize=12;startSize=8;endSize=8;curved=1;strokeColor=#CCCCCC;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="30" y="1160" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint y="1160" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-2" value="运算符（Java）" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="130" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-5" value="符号" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="180" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-6" value="描述" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="180" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-7" value="&amp;" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="210" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-8" value="并" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="210" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-9" value="|" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="240" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-10" value="或" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="240" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-11" value="^" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="270" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-12" value="异或" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="270" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-13" value="~" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="300" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-14" value="取反" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="300" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-15" value="&lt;&lt;" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="330" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-16" value="左移" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="330" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-17" value="&gt;&gt;" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="360" width="50" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-18" value="带符号右移" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="360" width="110" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-19" value="&gt;&gt;&gt;" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="410" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-20" value="无符号右移" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="410" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-21" value="规则" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="180" width="310" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-22" value="a&amp;b，位值都为1，结果为1。" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="210" width="310" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-23" value="a|b，位值都为0，结果为0。" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="240" width="310" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-24" value="a^b，位值不同，结果为1。" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="270" width="310" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-25" value="~a，位值0、1互换。" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="300" width="310" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-26" value="a &lt;&lt; n，舍弃n位高位，低位填充n位0。" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="330" width="310" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-27" value="a &gt;&gt; n，舍弃n位低位，高位填充n - 1位0，最高位保留符号值（正：0，负：1）。" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="360" width="310" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-28" value="a &gt;&gt;&gt; n，舍弃n位低位，高位填充n位0。" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="410" width="310" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-29" value="应用" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="490" width="40" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-31" value="1. 指定位置0（&amp;）<br>构造一个二进制数将置0位设置为0其他位设置为1，然后与目标值并运算。<br>a &amp; ...110011..." style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="530" width="470" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-32" value="3. 指定位置1（|）<br>构造一个二进制数将置1位设置为1其他位设置为0，然后与目标值或运算。<br>a | ...011100..." style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="730" width="470" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-33" value="4. 乘2（&lt;&lt;）<br>a &lt;&lt; 1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="830" width="100" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-34" value="5. 除以2（&gt;&gt;）<br>a &gt;&gt; 1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="890" width="120" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-35" value="2. 取指定位值（&amp;）<br>构造一个二进制数将取值位设置为1其他位设置为0，然后与目标值并运算。<br>a &amp; ...0111100..." style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="630" width="470" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QWvFizqGktiJlql-qzPI-36" value="6. 翻转指定位值（^）<br>构造一个二进制数将翻转位设置为1其他位设置为0，然后与目标值异或运算。<br>a ^ ...00110..." style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="950" width="470" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 48px; height: 1px; padding-top: 25px; margin-left: 12px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 位运算是二进制数值间各位进行的运算。

div.div: a << n，舍弃n位高位，低位填充n位0。

switch.text: a << n，舍弃n位高位，低位填充n位0。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 308px; height: 1px; padding-top: 385px; margin-left: 171px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: a >> n，舍弃n位低位，高位填充n - 1位0，最高位保留符号值（正：0，负：1）。

switch.text: a >> n，舍弃n位低位，高位填充n - 1位0，最高位保留符号值（正：0，负：1）。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 308px; height: 1px; padding-top: 425px; margin-left: 171px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: a >>> n，舍弃n位低位，高位填充n位0。

switch.text: a >>> n，舍弃n位低位，高位填充n位0。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 38px; height: 1px; padding-top: 505px; margin-left: 12px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 468px; height: 1px; padding-top: 575px; margin-left: 12px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. 指定位置0（&）
构造一个二进制数将置0位设置为0其他位设置为1，然后与目标值并运算。
a & ...110011...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 468px; height: 1px; padding-top: 775px; margin-left: 12px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
3. 指定位置1（|）
构造一个二进制数将置1位设置为1其他位设置为0，然后与目标值或运算。
a | ...011100...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 855px; margin-left: 12px;

div.div:
2. 取指定位值（&）
构造一个二进制数将取值位设置为1其他位设置为0，然后与目标值并运算。
a & ...0111100...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 468px; height: 1px; padding-top: 995px; margin-left: 12px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
6. 翻转指定位值（^）
构造一个二进制数将翻转位设置为1其他位设置为0，然后与目标值异或运算。
a ^ ...00110...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
